name: Mario on Indigo Island
storyline: After the collapse and escape of the Solitude Fortress, Mario has duped! The Cosmic Goombas have managed to take over his vacation island! Now he must exit his comfort zone and explore the island to close the opening rift of the Cosmic Dimmension and the Indigo Island! But that begs to differ, where is Bowser in all this?
summary: Mario on Indigo Island is a major ROM hack released in May 2019, featuring 13 levels and a total of 111 stars.
